title: The Symbolism & Meanings Behind Dreaming About Kittens

steps.title: Innocence
steps.content: Innocence With their big eyes and fluffy coats of fur, kittens are considered to be symbols of purity and childhood wonder in your dreams. If you’ve been feeling stressed or bored with your life, this is a sign to reconnect with your childhood hobbies and passions to feel rejuvenated and excited.

steps.title: New beginnings
steps.content: New beginnings Newborn kittens have their whole life ahead of them to learn how to play, hunt, and care for their own kittens one day. Their lives symbolize new opportunities and transformations in your own life. For example, you might dream about kittens when a new job, relationship, or move is on the horizon.

steps.title: Intuition
steps.content: Intuition In many cultures, cats and kittens are believed to be sacred, spiritual animals. Seeing one in your dream can signify that your consciousness and spirituality are growing. This can be a sign to let your gut feelings and instincts guide your decisions and that your spirit guides are nearby to lead you towards your purpose. [1] X Research source Cats were especially sacred to the ancient Egyptians. They saw cats as symbols of power, protection, fertility, and the divine. Several gods and goddesses, like Bastet, were depicted as having cat-like features and qualities. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Independence
steps.content: Independence Kittens have an insatiable desire to figure out and explore the world. When you see them in your dreams, they might represent your own curiosity and passion to forge a path that’s just yours. This might be your sign to plan a trip to a country you’ve never been to or to learn a new hobby or skill all on your own. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Femininity
steps.content: Femininity Cats and kittens are often regarded as symbols of compassion, nurturing, fertility, and playfulness. Dreaming about kittens might indicate that your feminine energy and your connection to the divine feminine are growing. Or, it can be a reminder to take care of the women in your life.

steps.title: Holding a kitten can mean you’ll overcome challenges and feel at peace.
steps.content: Holding a kitten can mean you’ll overcome challenges and feel at peace. A dream about cupping a sweet kitten between your hands might represent your desire for safety and comfort. There might be problems in your life or job that stress you out and leave you out of balance. Luckily, this dream can be a sign that you have the ability to tackle these challenges and that relief and serenity are around the corner. [4] X Research source Face your problems head-on by writing down each thing you need to tackle. This gives you clarity on what the problem is and helps you brainstorm solutions with ease.

steps.title: A dream about feeding a kitten might mean you feel cared for.
steps.content: A dream about feeding a kitten might mean you feel cared for. Nurturing a tiny kitten can symbolize your gratefulness for being loved and supported by your partner, friends, and family. Whether your partner cooked for you after a long, hard day or your friends helped you prepare for a big presentation, this is a sweet reminder that you have people supporting you. [5] X Research source This dream can also represent your desire to return the favor. For example, you might show your gratitude by surprising a friend with tickets to their favorite band or writing your significant other a sweet note.

steps.title: Seeing an injured kitten can indicate that you feel scared or anxious.
steps.content: Seeing an injured kitten can indicate that you feel scared or anxious. Dreaming about a hurt or sick kitten isn’t usually a pleasant dream and can mean there are issues at work or in your personal life that are stressing you out. You might feel like you’re unable to tackle these problems, which might leave you feeling overwhelmed, vulnerable, and helpless. A dream about an injured kitten can also be a warning to watch out for your health or people and situations that might cause you harm. Follow and trust your intuition when someone gives you an uneasy feeling.

steps.title: Dreaming about a dying kitten can mean you’re in for a transformation.
steps.content: Dreaming about a dying kitten can mean you’re in for a transformation. Seeing a dying or dead kitten is likely the last thing you want to dream about, but luckily, this dream is considered a good omen. This can indicate that you’re about to experience a major life change or go through a personal evolution. For instance, you might finally find an opening at your dream company or meet the love of your life. A dying kitten can also signify a spiritual transformation. For example, you might take a trip that connects you to your spirituality and gives you perspective about your purpose.

steps.title: A kitten attacking you can signify trouble in your relationships.
steps.content: A kitten attacking you can signify trouble in your relationships. Dreaming about a kitten biting and scratching at you can represent the arguments or issues you’re having with a partner, friend, or family member in your waking life. This might be your subconscious telling you to discuss the issue and reconcile to bring peace back to your relationship. [6] X Research source If you and a friend are fighting, resolve the argument by identifying the issue and listening to your friend’s perspective. Then, reach a solution about dealing with the issue in the future that makes you both happy.

steps.title: Kittens attacking each other can indicate someone might betray you.
steps.content: Kittens attacking each other can indicate someone might betray you. Watching kittens fight in your dream might be a warning about new acquaintances or old friends coming into your life. This is your sign to stay alert and wary about their intentions with your friendship, as they might be jealous of your success and try to tear you down. [7] X Research source Practice mindfulness to develop your awareness of your body and surroundings to help suss out people who don’t have your best interests at heart.

steps.title: Hearing a kitten meow might symbolize your ambition and drive.
steps.content: Hearing a kitten meow might symbolize your ambition and drive. A kitten’s little mews and chatter might represent your awakening desire for success and recognition. You might have finally reached a professional or personal goal and realized how great it feels to work hard and accomplish something. [8] X Research source Take this as a sign to set big, life goals for yourself. Reflect on what you want your future to look like and write down specific goals that get you there. For example, if you want to be a painter, your goals might be going to art school, working in a studio, and selling your work in a gallery to become well-known.

steps.title: Saving kittens in a dream can mean you want independence.
steps.content: Saving kittens in a dream can mean you want independence. Dreaming about rescuing stray kittens might represent your desire to leave behind the problems and boredom you feel in your life. You might feel held down by your career or where you live, so you’re antsy to make a change and search for a more exciting path in life. [9] X Research source You don’t have to make drastic changes to get out of your rut. Something as small as taking a different route to work or studying at a different coffee shop can help you feel energized and motivated.

steps.title: A cat with her kittens can symbolize your friends’ support.
steps.content: A cat with her kittens can symbolize your friends’ support. There’s nothing more heartwarming than dreaming about a cat snuggling and caring for her kittens. If you have been feeling lonely or upset about something, this can serve as a reminder that your support system is right behind you to help you work through your problem and feel loved and worthy. [10] X Research source Having a dream about a cat and kittens can also signify bonding. You might develop a deeper connection with an acquaintance or forge a new friendship in the near future.

steps.title: A cat having her kittens in a dream might represent new beginnings.
steps.content: A cat having her kittens in a dream might represent new beginnings. In the world of dreams, witnessing the birth of kittens can symbolize your transition into a new stage of life. This might mean that you’re up for a promotion, your significant other is going to propose, or your sibling is going to have a baby that makes you an uncle or aunt. Entering a new life stage typically involves taking on new responsibilities. To prioritize all your tasks , write down everything you need to do. Then, divide the items into things you have to get done now, and tasks that are ongoing.

steps.title: Seeing a black kitten can signify you have hidden feelings.
steps.content: Seeing a black kitten can signify you have hidden feelings. The shadow-like appearance of a black kitten might represent emotions and behaviors you’re keeping locked away. For example, this might be your secret crush on a friend or your frustrations with your partner. Take this dream as a sign to be honest with yourself and confront these feelings. Shoot your shot and tell your crush you like them , or gently bring up your issues with your significant other.

steps.title: A white kitten might represent prosperity and good luck.
steps.content: A white kitten might represent prosperity and good luck. Dreaming about a fluffy white kitten is typically seen as a good omen. It can indicate that all your hard work will pay off: you might get a raise at your job or have a first date go well and blossom into a romance. [11] X Research source If you’re going through a rough patch in life, white kittens can also indicate that your fortune is about to turn.

steps.title: A dream about a gray kitten might symbolize balance and wisdom.
steps.content: A dream about a gray kitten might symbolize balance and wisdom. Seeing a gray kitten in your dream is typically a good sign. It can indicate that your intuition and knowledge about the world is growing. You might gain clarity about your goals in life, or take this dream as a sign to learn a new skill to be better at your job. If the gray kitten made you feel upset or anxious, it might represent fears or insecurities you’re feeling about your job or relationships. This might mean that it’s time to face your issues head-on.

steps.title: An orange kitten can represent energy and optimism.
steps.content: An orange kitten can represent energy and optimism. The bright, happy hue of an orange kitten’s fur can indicate that you have the motivation to make your dreams a reality. This is your sign to take a risk because hope and good luck are on your side. For example, you might finally ask your crush out or send an application to your dream school.

steps.title: Seeing a brown kitten might signify peace and stability.
steps.content: Seeing a brown kitten might signify peace and stability. Dreaming about a playful brown kitten can mean that you’re entering a calm and secure stage of your life. If your life has felt unpredictable with multiple job changes and moves, this can be a sign that things are slowing down and you’re finally in a physical or mental place where you can breathe and set down roots. A brown kitten can also be a reminder to ground yourself . This can help you reduce your stress and feel more balanced emotionally.

steps.title: A Siamese kitten might represent wisdom and spirituality.
steps.content: A Siamese kitten might represent wisdom and spirituality. With their bright blue eyes and lithe stature, Siamese kittens often look like they know about the mysteries of life. Seeing them in your dream is believed to symbolize your growing awareness and spirituality. [12] X Research source For example, after dreaming about a Siamese kitten you might go through a spiritual awakening and get clarity about your life’s path and purpose.

steps.title: Persian kittens can symbolize new opportunities and possibilities.
steps.content: Persian kittens can symbolize new opportunities and possibilities. The scrunched face of a tiny Persian kitten might be a good omen about your future. This dream can indicate that your desire for success and your openness to try new things will bring you prosperity in your career or relationships. [13] X Research source The dream can also be a sign to take risks and go after opportunities when they present themselves to you.

steps.title: Seeing a Ragdoll kitten might signify peace and motivation.
steps.content: Seeing a Ragdoll kitten might signify peace and motivation. When you see gentle Ragdoll kittens in your dream, this can mean that good things are in store for you. The Ragdoll kitten’s friendly nature might indicate that you have the power to deal with all of your problems and will find serenity on the other side. [14] X Research source These kittens are an especially powerful symbol if you’ve been dealing with a lot of stress at work or in your personal life.

steps.title: A Maine Coon kitten can mean that you want to be comforted.
steps.content: A Maine Coon kitten can mean that you want to be comforted. You might dream about a statuesque Maine Coon kitten if you’re dealing with a failure at work or going through a tough breakup. This kitten breed might come to you to remind you to reach out to your friends or family for support to get through your hard time. [15] X Research source Help your support system help you by telling them that you need support. Then, be clear about what they can do or help you with to feel better.

steps.title: Bengal kittens can represent confidence and independence.
steps.content: Bengal kittens can represent confidence and independence. The fierce, wild looks of a Bengal kitten can mean that you feel in control of yourself and your life. This might be a sign that you’re maturing and walking on the right path—everything from your career and relationships to the city you live in just feels right.
